BodyName: Committee on Civil Service and Labor

Items.Title: Oversight - Civil Service Opportunities in NYC: An Update on Recruitment, Testing and Training
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Civil Service Opportunities in NYC: An Update on Recruitment, Testing and Training

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the three-platoon system of the department of correction, and to repeal subdivision e of section 9-116 of the administrative code of the city of New York, relating to removal of the correction commissioner for having failed to install a system of rotating tours of duty.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Three-platoon system of the department of correction.

Items.Title: Oversight - Civil Service Opportunities in NYC: An Update on Recruitment, Testing and Training
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Filed, by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Civil Service Opportunities in NYC: An Update on Recruitment, Testing and Training

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the three-platoon system of the department of correction, and to repeal subdivision e of section 9-116 of the administrative code of the city of New York, relating to removal of the correction commissioner for having failed to install a system of rotating tours of duty.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Three-platoon system of the department of correction.
